DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will test whether hypotonic (diluted) remodulin solution causes less pain than the eutonic (undiluted) solution supplied by the manufacturer.
DOC.brief_title: Hypotonic Treprostinil Subcutaneous Infusion for Control of Treprostinil Related Site Pain
DOC.criteria: PAH by standard criteria Treatment with subcutaneous remodulin infusion for at least 3 months, with stable dose for 1 month Pain at infusion site (defined as > 8 on McGill Pain Questionnaire) Known pregnancy or breastfeeding
